https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9KfxFc6zm3hUB0lt7yJf5iJPh8C.jpg In the Sicilian town of Taormina, Italy, an aspiring writer in search of inspiration meets a folk singer trying to write a follow up to her breakout hit. Their chemistry sparks collaboration, challenging each other to express their thorniest secrets. A Chance Encounter
